title: Storyboard stacks · Google Doc links and config
note: Paste each stack's Google Doc link in googleDocUrl. Process each photo into a 30-second frame / trading card; use FRAME_TRADING_CARD_FORMAT.md. Real names and places in NAMING_AND_PLACES.md.

stacks.name: Now playing
stacks.description: Now-playing deck, foundational setting of now, POV main character, center console, layers of other sets. Operators and console characters.

stacks.name: Full play deck · Main story
stacks.description: Gold Rush story, Josephine's Saloon and Bar. All sets and characters through Singularity 9 Awareness.

stacks.name: Crystalline
stacks.description: Crystalline characters, abstract characters, crystallizing views and maps.

stacks.name: Biological enriching characters
stacks.description: Enriching characters in the biological world. Human and animal.

stacks.name: Genuine hearts · Golden hearts
stacks.description: Genuine hearts, golden hearts. Characters and scenes — bird, truck, plane, plant, etc. Very thick stack.

stacks.name: Disingenuous · fake carbon characters
stacks.description: Carbon hearts in a fake biological wrapper. Thin stack.

stacks.name: Destination · versions of me · playlists
stacks.description: Versions of me, self-portraits through time; destination stories (Alaska, Montana); Gold Heart 21+. Interject into now-playing.

episodeStructure.episodes2Plus: Deep dives on parts; mix and match; seasons
